And all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%>, who are nearest <S%H7138><s%> unto the slain <S%H2491><s%> man <S%H7364><s%>, shall wash their hands <S%H3027><s%> over the heifer <S%H5697><s%> whose neck was broken <S%H6202><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%>;

and seest <S%H7200><s%> among the captives <S%H7633><s%> a beautiful <S%H8389><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, and thou hast a desire <S%H2836><s%> unto her <S%H3947><s%>, and wouldest take her to thee to wife <S%H802><s%>;

And all the men <S%H582><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him to death <S%H4191><s%> with stones <S%H68><s%>: so shalt thou put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H3478><s%>; and all Israel shall hear <S%H8085><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> have committed a sin <S%H2399><s%> worthy of <S%H4941><s%> death <S%H4194><s%>, and he be put to death <S%H4191><s%>, and thou hang <S%H8518><s%> him on a tree <S%H6086><s%>;

his body <S%H5038><s%> shall not remain all night <S%H3885><s%> upon the tree <S%H6086><s%>, but thou shalt surely <S%H6912><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> him the same day <S%H3117><s%>; for he that is hanged <S%H8518><s%> is accursed <S%H7045><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; that thou defile <S%H2930><s%> not thy land <S%H127><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
